sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import html2canvas from "html2canvas"; import "./App.css"; function App() { const [screenshot, setScreenshot] = useState({ username: "用户名", keepTitle: "Keep·户外跑步", miles: 3.72, pace: "07'28\"", duration: "00:27:47", calories: 266, date: new Date(2024, 9, 13, 21, 29), // 2024/10/13 21:29 temperature: 12, humidity: 23, }); const [bgImage, setBgImage] = useState("/images/bg1_1.png"); const newImgRef = useRef(null); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScreenshot((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleBgImageChange = (e) => { const selectedBg = e.target.value; setBgImage(selectedBg); }; const generateScreenshot = () => { html2canvas(newImgRef.current).then((canvas) => { const link = document.createElement("a"); link.download = `keep${screenshot.date.getMonth() + 1}月${screenshot.date.getDate()}日跑步打卡.png`; link.href = canvas.toDataURL(); link.click(); }); }; return (

Keep运动截图生成器

预览
{screenshot.keepTitle}
{screenshot.miles.toFixed(2)} 公里
{screenshot.date.toLocaleString("zh-CN", { year: "numeric", month: "2-digit", day: "2-digit", hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", hour12: false, })} {screenshot.temperature}°C {screenshot.humidity}%
{screenshot.pace} 平均配速
{screenshot.duration} 用时 {screenshot.duration} 用时
{screenshot.calories} 千卡
{screenshot.date.toLocaleString("zh-CN", { year: "numeric", month: "2-digit", day: "2-digit", hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", hour12: false, })} ☀️ {screenshot.temperature}°C {screenshot.humidity}%
🏅
3 公里成绩 {screenshot.ranking}
{screenshot.ageGroup}
›
 数据设置
用户名 Keep标题 公里数 平均配速 用时 消耗卡路里 日期时间 handleInputChange({ target: { name: "date", value: new Date(e.target.value), }, }) } /> 温度 (°C) 湿度 (%) 背景图片 自定义背景图片
); } export default App;
